ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How many threads can I witness in one hour?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, my rogue on Tallon Zek (who I just made 2 nights ago) is level 6, completely un-twinked.  Has full leather armor, a Giant Snake Fang and is starting to
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, my rogue on Tallon Zek (who I just made 2 nights ago) is level 6,
completely un-twinked. Has full leather armor, a Giant Snake Fang and is
starting to buy her banded already. What you're doing wrong is not using
trade skills ;) Some of them are profitable even for NPC's ;) I can make
almost 5 platinum an hour with my rogue ;) (at level 6 that's not bad at
all ;)

Trade skills ;) Specifically: Tailoring ;)

>
> So you're level 10, untwinked, and wearing BANDED??? What am I doing
wrong?
> <sigh>
>
> Good job helping that other bard out. He must have been twinked to get to
> level 10 playing only one song. Weaving's all that's kept me alive many
> times over.
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
> Adagia wrote:
> > obvious he was twinked. Here was this level 10 wood elf bard, dressed
> > head to toe in bronze. I gave him the gauntlets, and he very
> > graciously
> > gave me his old bronze gauntlets. :) They look nice on Adagia, but I
> > think they are too heavy, I'll probably just stick to banded for now.
